Blizzard/Infectra

*Blizzard smiles*

Blizzard: Okay, let's hurry so we don=
't miss anything else like maybe a nice battle.

*Blizzard says to Sinister=
*



*Infectra smiles when Airbomber hugs her. She didn't think love could =
happen so sudden and fast*

Infectra: There are probably tones of Maximals =
in there going on with lifes pretending we're not here.

*infectra says and=
 than grins*

Infectra: If we wait long enough then we'll get to play in th=
e leaves and snow and than relax in the sun.

*Infectra says joking wonderi=
ng when someone will notice them*


  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From:=
 THECODE 
  To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
  Sent: Friday, August 04, 2000 4:48 PM=

  Subject: Re: NBW


  "I don't know, let's go back there, now." Sinister =
said to Blizzard.

  Airbomber watched Stranato running around and calling =
out. He laughed.

  "Stranato better get some help, otherwise be might beco=
me a 'heel' again." Airbomber said. He smiled and hugged Infectra, he never=
 felt this way about a girl before....
    ----- Original Message ----- 
  =
  From: ilovealllizards 
    To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
    Sent: Friday, Augu=
st 04, 2000 4:38 AM
    Subject: Re: NBW


    Twister/Blizzard/Infectra


=

    *Twister looks at the sword and sighs*

    Twister: I'll have to get =
used to the fact that, my sister has a life too and I'll have to learn to t=
ravel alone....

    *Twister sighs and slowly and gentley places the energ=
on eagles into her arm compartment*


    *Blizzard looks at Sinister and s=
miles*

    Blizzard: I wonder what's happening back at the base.



    *I=
nfectra smiles back at Airbomber*

    Infectra: I trust the both of you...=
...I did trust the others but....

    *Infectra sighs*

    Infectra: I ne=
ed to stop thinking of things that upset me. But, it's hard to thinl of the=
 good times because there were hardly none.

    *Infectra says to Airbombe=
r and grins*


      ----- Original Message ----- 
      From: THECODE 
   =
   To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
      Sent: Friday, August 04, 2000 4:20 AM
    =
  Subject: Re: NBW


      Sinesis frowns. He holds up his brothers sword.
=

      "He left this here, without it, what shall he do? We have simular pr=
oblems. I just wish I still had him by my side." Sinesis said to Twister.

=
      Sinister held Blizzards hand, illegal fireworks shooting off in his e=
yes.

      Stranato calls out.

      "Hey, any Maximals here?" He yells t=
hrough the base. Airbomber sits down and looks to Infectra. He smiles.

   =
   "Hopefully, the Maximals will listen to us, they must know of the occure=
nces happening. I trust Stranato, he's always been good. Well, maybe he has=
n't always been good, but he's good now." Airbomber said to Infectra. He la=
ughed at his words...
        ----- Original Message ----- 
        From: i=
lovealllizards 
        To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
        Sent: Thursday, Aug=
ust 03, 2000 11:44 PM
        Subject: Re: NBW


        Twister/Blizzard/I=
nfectra



        *Twister looks at Sinesis*

        Twister: I've decide=
d to let my sister be...For she's my sister and I love her too much to pull=
 her away from the she loves....

        *Twister opens her arm compartmen=
t and pulls out a two small pieces of energon both shaped like an eagle*

 =
       Twister: Our parents gave us both one to unite us as sisters and fri=
ends forever and always help each other. I found Blizzard's on the ground i=
n front of the base. I doubt she dropped it by accident.....

        *Twis=
ter holds out to Sinesis so he can see*



        (OOC: Ack! I meant The T=
eam Ultima Base! My bad, Sorry.)

        *Blizzard skips out of the cave a=
nd walks next to Sinister for The Team Ultima Base and holds her hand out w=
anting Sinister to hold her hand*



        *Infectra follows Stranato and=
 Airbomber into the Maximal Base*


          ----- Original Message ----- =

          From: THECODE 
          To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
          Sent:=
 Thursday, August 03, 2000 6:59 PM
          Subject: Re: NBW


          S=
inesis sighs and stares at Twister. (Sorry about earlier.)

          Sinis=
ter frowns when he sees Blizar walking toward the Maximal base.

          =
"Where are you going? And can I come?" Sinister asked.

          Stranato =
and Airbomber stop at the Maximal base, since they were never set on enemy =
and never betrayed the Maximals, they went on in...
            ----- Origi=
nal Message ----- 
            From: ilovealllizards 
            To: nbwrp=
g@egroups.com 
            Sent: Thursday, August 03, 2000 6:46 PM
        =
    Subject: Re: NBW


            Infectra/Wrath/Blizzard/Twister


      =
      *Infectra follows Stranato and Airbomber towards the Maximal Base*


=

            *Wrath gets into a CR Chamber when he arives at the Maximal Ba=
se awaits his repairs*



            *Blizzard does a little skip out of t=
he cave walks next to Sinister for the Maximal Base and holds her hand out =
towards his wanting to hold hands with him*



            (OOC: Twister is=
 out near the Maximal Base but I'm making her come back anyway.)

         =
   *Twister leaves the location of the Maximal Base seeing as how everyone =
was else where and went back to Team Ultimas Base and sits at the same tabl=
e as Sinesis*

            Twister: I don't know what I'm going to do....I =
end up here thinking I'll find a nice Team where I'm wanted and me and my s=
ister could be sisters and friends...I was such a fool for believing such h=
appiness could happen.....

            *Twister puts her double sided swor=
d away stares at the table*


              ----- Original Message ----- 
 =
             From: THECODE 
              To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
         =
     Sent: Thursday, August 03, 2000 6:27 PM
              Subject: NBW


 =
             Stranato and Airbomber walked toward the Maximal base.

      =
        Gangon, still dying.

              Deemos and Inzola confront one =
another several times, but Inzola always runs from Deemos.

              E=
tchingar called out to Megatron.

              "Hey, do I got the job?" He=
 asked.

              Time Bomb waited patiently and Land Mine was healed =
now. Land Mine looked around, looking to meet Megatron.

              Sini=
ster came out of the cave (Hopefully with Blizzard.) and started back towar=
d Team Ultima's base.

              Sinesis was healed and sat down next t=
o Twister...
